lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The device was thrown from a passing vehicle as trainee township policemen from all over South Africa were on parade at the Tladi police training centre, the government's Bureau for Information said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Security is a major election issue, with extreme right-wingers accusing the government of being soft in the face of a "revolutionary onslaught."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The government has blamed a spate of limpet mine blasts in South African cities in recent months on the outlawed African National Congress (ANC), fighting a low-level guerrilla war against white domination in South Africa.
